name: Raymond PUGSLEY, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellees

parties: Raymond PUGSLEY, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of April, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
849 A.2d 1129
Raymond PUGSLEY, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 15, 2004.
